  • Classes in com.stormpath.sdk.account used by com.stormpath.sdk.account 
    Class and Description
    Account
    An Account is a unique identity within a Directory.
    AccountCriteria
    An Account-specific Criteria class, enabling an Account-specific fluentquery DSL.
    AccountLink
    A AccountLink represents the link between 2 Accounts

    Deleting this resource will only delete the association - it will not delete the accounts themselves Account
    AccountLinkCriteria
    An Account-specific Criteria class, enabling an Account-specific fluentquery DSL.
    AccountLinkingPolicy
    An AccountLinkingPolicy resource is used to configure different aspects of account linking associated with an accountStoreHolder
    AccountLinkingStatus
    An AccountLinkingStatus represents whether Account Linking is ENABLED or DISABLED.
    AccountLinkList
    A CollectionResource containing AccountLink instances.
    AccountLinkOptions
    AccountLink-specific options that may be specified when retrieving AccountLink resources.
    AccountList
    A CollectionResource containing Account instances.
    AccountOptions
    Account-specific options that may be specified when retrieving Account resources.
    AccountStatus
    An AccountStatus represents the various states an account may be in.
    AutomaticProvisioningStatus
    An AutomaticProvisioningStatus represents whether to automatically provision/create an account in the default Account Store, and link it with the current account (used during login), when AccountLinking is enabled for the Application/Organization.
    CreateAccountRequest
    Represents an attempt to create a new Account record in Stormpath.
    CreateAccountRequestBuilder
    A Builder to construct CreateAccountRequests.
    EmailVerificationStatus 
    EmailVerificationToken 
    PasswordFormat
    A PasswordFormat represents the various formats supported for Password Import Read more info about the supported formats here
    VerificationEmailRequest
    The VerificationEmailRequest is used in scenarios where the Account Registration and Verification workflow is enabled.
    VerificationEmailRequestBuilder
    A Builder to construct VerificationEmailRequests.
